sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of crime occurring in a neighborhood
message_1: What is the probability of a theft occurring in a particular neighborhood, given that it has been observed that the probability of a theft occurring in any given month is 0.03?
message_2: The probability of a theft occurring in a particular neighborhood in any given month is 0.03. This means that there is a 3% chance of a theft happening in that neighborhood each month.
